article_title: Editorial: For Democrats, Hillary Clinton is only logical choice

article_metadata.description: As secretary of state, Hillary Clinton traded transparency for secrecy by moving her official State Department email, which included classified and highly sensitive information, to a private server. That fact is not lost on the partisans who for years have attempted to vilify her nor the federal agents now investigating the decision — one that runs roughshod over official government policy. Troublesome, too, are the missteps under her leadership that led to the death of four Americans,
article_metadata.author: Repository Editorial Board
